languages.text: {n}Лицо Ирлиэт кривится в массе гримас — от злости и ненависти до уныния и отчаяния. Вскоре, однако, эльдарка собирается с духом и неловко, едва слышно произносит:{/n} "Мои слова не залечат ран вашего тела. И все же я сожалею о том, что вам пришлось пережить. Из-за меня".

{n}Yrliet's face contorts in a mix of emotions — from anger and hatred to dejection and despair. But soon, she musters her courage and in a stilted, barely audible voice, says,{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds on your bodies. And still, I regret what you had to endure. Because of me."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Ирлиэт кривится в массе гримас — от злости и ненависти до уныния и отчаяния. Вскоре, однако, эльдарка собирается с духом и неловко, едва слышно произносит:{/n} "Мои слова не залечат ран вашего тела. И все же я сожалею о том, что вам пришлось пережить. Из-за меня".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's face twists in a mix of emotions — from anger and hatred to dejection and despair. But soon, she musters her spirit and speaks out awkwardly, barely audible: {/n}"My words will not heal the wounds on your bodies. And still, I regret that what you had to go through. Because of me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}愤怒、怨恨、沮丧、绝望，伊莉耶特脸上的表情千变万化，阴晴不定。但她终于鼓起勇气，用细若蚊蚋的声音干巴巴地开了口。{/n}“我的道歉不能治愈大家身体上的伤口，但即便如此，我依然对你们所承受的一切感到非常抱歉。这都是我的错。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face contorts in a mix of emotions — from anger and hatred to dejection and despair. But soon, she musters her courage and in a stilted, barely audible voice, says,{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds on your bodies. And still, I regret what you had to endure. Because of me."

traits.locale_text: {n}愤怒、怨恨、沮丧、绝望，伊莉耶特脸上的表情千变万化，阴晴不定。但她终于鼓起勇气，用细若蚊蚋的声音干巴巴地开了口。{/n}“我的道歉不能治愈大家身体上的伤口，但即便如此，我依然对你们所承受的一切感到非常抱歉。这都是我的错。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Yrliet se contrae con una mezcla de emociones, desde ira y odio hasta desánimo y desesperación. Pero no tarda en hacer acopio de valor y murmura una disculpa que suena forzada:{/n} «Mis palabras no sanarán las heridas de vuestros cuerpos. Aun así, lamento lo que habéis padecido. Por mi culpa».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face contorts in a mix of emotions — from anger and hatred to dejection and despair. But soon, she musters her courage and in a stilted, barely audible voice, says,{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds on your bodies. And still, I regret what you had to endure. Because of me."

Pero no tarda en hacer acopio de valor y murmura una disculpa que suena forzada:{/n} «Mis palabras no sanarán las heridas de vuestros cuerpos. Aun así, lamento lo que habéis padecido. Por mi culpa».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Yrliet est traversé par différentes émotions : vous y lisez la colère et la haine, mais aussi l'abattement et le désespoir. Elle parvient à rassembler son courage et répond d'une voix presque inaudible :{/n} « Mes paroles ne soigneront pas vos blessures physiques, mais je suis navrée de tout ce que vous avez enduré. Par ma faute. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face contorts in a mix of emotions — from anger and hatred to dejection and despair. But soon, she musters her courage and in a stilted, barely audible voice, says,{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds on your bodies. And still, I regret what you had to endure. Because of me."

Elle parvient à rassembler son courage et répond d'une voix presque inaudible :{/n} « Mes paroles ne soigneront pas vos blessures physiques, mais je suis navrée de tout ce que vous avez enduré. Par ma faute. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Gesicht zeigt diverse Emotionen – Wut und Hass, Mutlosigkeit und Verzweiflung. Aber schon bald nimmt sie ihren Mut zusammen und sagt mit gestelzter, kaum hörbarer Stimme:{/n} "Meine Worte werden die Wunden auf Euren Körpern nicht heilen. Dennoch bereue ich, was Ihr ertragen musstet. Meinetwegen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face contorts in a mix of emotions — from anger and hatred to dejection and despair. But soon, she musters her courage and in a stilted, barely audible voice, says,{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds on your bodies. And still, I regret what you had to endure. Because of me."

Dennoch bereue ich, was Ihr ertragen musstet. Meinetwegen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの顔が怒りや憎しみ、落胆や絶望など、さまざまな感情が入り混じってゆがむ。しかし、すぐに彼女は勇気を奮い立たせ、かろうじて聞き取れるような声で告げた、{/n}「我の言葉では、お前たちの体の傷を癒すことはできない。それでも、我はお前が経験させられたことについて後悔している。我が原因だったが故に」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face contorts in a mix of emotions — from anger and hatred to dejection and despair. But soon, she musters her courage and in a stilted, barely audible voice, says,{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds on your bodies. And still, I regret what you had to endure. Because of me."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの顔が怒りや憎しみ、落胆や絶望など、さまざまな感情が入り混じってゆがむ。しかし、すぐに彼女は勇気を奮い立たせ、かろうじて聞き取れるような声で告げた、{/n}「我の言葉では、お前たちの体の傷を癒すことはできない。それでも、我はお前が経験させられたことについて後悔している。我が原因だったが故に」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, karmaşık duygular içinde yüzünü buruşturuyor. İfadesi öfkeden nefrete, üzüntüden umutsuzluğa dönüşüyor. Sonra cesaretini topluyor, ciddi ve zar zor duyulan bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sözlerim, bedenlerinizdeki yaraları iyileştirmeyecek. Yine de benim yüzümden katlanmak zorunda kaldıklarınız için üzgünüm."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face contorts in a mix of emotions — from anger and hatred to dejection and despair. But soon, she musters her courage and in a stilted, barely audible voice, says,{/n} "My words will not heal the wounds on your bodies. And still, I regret what you had to endure. Because of me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, yüzünü karmaşık duygular içinde buruşturuyor. İfadesi öfkeden nefrete, üzüntüden umutsuzluğa dönüşüyor. Sonra cesaretin, topluyor, ciddi ve zar zor duyulan bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sözlerim, bedenlerinizdeki yaraları iyileştirmeyecek. Yine de benim yüzümden katlanmak zorunda kaldıklarınız için üzgünüm."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
